Package p

Package containing all classes of LandFight.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Controller This is the main class of LandFight.

This program has been created for 'Java technology turns 10!'

This is the control layer in the MVC architecture.
Model This is the model layer of the MVC architecture.
MovingObject This class represents a moving object over the land.
A moving object has a 3 dimensional position and a 3D velocity.
Moving objects are Comparable, which helps the right 3D rendering.
ShapeObject Represents a(n moving) object which has a shape (which is not used in the game, for space matters we merged with its inheriter classes!).
The class also represents the rocket, if instances are created by callin the public constructor with false parameter.
The class also represents the player, if instances are created by callin the public constructor with true parameter.
View The view layer in the MVC architectrue.
The view consists of: 2 game scene parts, which is a view of the players and their environment including the land, 2 player status parts where we can see heights, our shield, and our weapon reloading status, one minimap of the whole land.
 

Package p Description

Package containing all classes of LandFight.
